name: Descent 2
description: You're going down... again.If you thought Descent™ went to the edge of 360° 3D power-blasting sensory insanity, then prepare yourself. You're about to plunge over the edge, and into the depths of Descent II™.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 8.1 Processor: 1 Gigahertz or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: Sound Blaster compatible
